# tag

**Instance Property**

A label that identifies this device in the guest VM.

## Declaration

```swift
var tag: String { get set }
```

## Getting file system information

- **share**: A value that defines how the host exposes resources to the guest virtual machine.
- **macOSGuestAutomountTag**: A value that indicates that the guest needs to automount this file system device in the guest VM.

items.description: A value that defines how the host exposes resources to the guest virtual machine.
items.name: share

items.description: A value that indicates that the guest needs to automount this file system device in the guest VM.
items.name: macOSGuestAutomountTag
